text: The best things in life are unexpected - because there were no expectations.
author: Eli Khamarov

text: I will do my best. That is all I can do. I ask for your help - and God's.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

text: The best doctors in the world are Doctor Diet, Doctor Quiet, and Doctor Merryman.
author: Jonathan Swift

text: To love and win is the best thing. To love and lose, the next best.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray
